item.description:
Join us for a TGIF happy hours at Hyatt Regency, Downtown Crossing. It has a nice terrace area (Lobby Bar) to hang out on a warm summer nite. . Itâ€™s a great way to kick back and relax after a long week of hard work. We will meet at 6:30 pm, afterward we may go to dinner in Chinatown or in the area. For more information about Hyatt, please go to http://regencyboston....


1 Avenue De Lafayette
Boston, MA 02111
(617) 912-1234

all new and old members are welcome...


Susan
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of Asians
